How It Works

Markdown Slides is a markdown editor at its core, using features and APIs from the react-markdown-editor-lite npm package. With help from a parser, I wrote code to extract markdown from the editor and split the text into distinct slides in a deck. Slides are defined using headers, and users can swap between the slides using the legend in the left-most column.

Future Updates

For now, the only way to swap between slides is to select headings from the legend. I’ll be implementing slide controls and full-screen previews to enable the basics of a presentation tool.
